official_title: A bill to designate the public park known as the Stinson Creek Recreation Area and located at Columbus Lake in Loundes County, Mississippi, as the Lloyd D. Hayes Recreation Area.

summary.text: Designates the public park known as the Stinson Creek Recreation Area, at Columbus Lake in Loundes County, Mississippi, as the Lloyd D. Hayes Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill to designate the public park known as the Stinson Creek Recreation Area and located at Columbus Lake in Loundes County, Mississippi, as the Lloyd D. Hayes Recreation Area.
